name: Emojishot
description:
Join your friends in an emoji-based guessing game that will challenge your creativity. Use emoji to create a snapshot that you think your friends could guess. Progress as you guess correctly to unlock new puzzles and challenges. Share your creations with friends and ask for help when stumped.

Features:
- Pick the puzzle word that inspires your next creation based on difficulty
- Easily find the emoji you’re looking for using the search bar
- Unlock more puzzles as you progress with successful guesses
- Share with friends to ask for help solving the puzzle
- Want to speed things up? Nudge your friends to play
- Save your creations to your camera roll to share with the world
